@graph.name: Chaturbuja Infra Open Plots at Kanchikacherla
@graph.description: CRDA approved open plots near Amaravati at Chevitikallu, Kanchikacherla. 40 ft CC roads, park, drainage, and bank loan assistance.

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, this is a CRDA-approved open plot venture by Chaturbuja Infra located at Chevitikallu near Kanchikacherla.

mainEntity.name: What are the plot sizes available?

acceptedAnswer.text: Plots start from 134 sq yd onwards, priced at ₹11,000 per sq yd.
The layout includes 40 ft CC roads, children’s park, jogging track, drainage, street lights, and bank loan assistance.
Paritala Anjaneya Swamy Temple, Amaravati, Nandigama, Jaggayyapeta, Vijayawada, and the proposed Logistic Hub are nearby.
